task.summary: Added (1) note popups, and (2) verse line numbering.
cataloger for poems; poem/verse raw text parsing into internal structure; uploader for raw text
refactored editor engine, settings; added socket.io capability; systematized app tagging mechanism
sharing js between node.js and client; definitions cleanup
errorSocket communicates errors between client and server; tidied-up catalog and isolated catalog import/export methods
added notification system for push info from server
Added transaction service (websocket). Refactored notifications and config service.
websocket state saved in session object; socket handling session-specific.
Added store layer to wrap db; separated saving catalog from data submissions; homogenized error and operation return hierarchy and callback methods
changed submitter into catalog page (a center for find, browse, submit, and related operations), and factored out js into controller.
added catalog search API; cleaned up
appCtrl.js is now the global (highest level) controller for the app. Responsible for reseting state on page reloads, etc.
Updated to latest angular and angular-ui.
specs for each field in context of work type; more data-driven validation
more search ui; typeahead lookup of publisher addresses
poetry contents upload and update from raw file
poetry contents upload and update from raw file (2)
db startup script enables text indexing
some work on content chunking for poetry
some work on content chunking for poetry
ui work: catalog field enable/disable; edit button; some refactoring
Changed to ui-router for greater flexibility
More pretty printing; search result directive delegates to controller.
